text: Babak Khorramdin (; 1974-2021) was an Iranian director and writer who was killed by his parents. His death became a hot topic on the social media and was covered in the news. == Other websites == * * Tragic murder of an Iranian cinema director 'by his parents' - BBC * About Babak Khorramdin, the murder and his "oath" - ISNA Category:Iranian writers Category:1974 births Category:2021 deaths
title: Babak Khorramdin
